subject.normal: [Bug 207525] New: Konqueror crashed when I loaded another web page

headers.subject: [Bug 207525] New: Konqueror crashed when I loaded another web page
headers.received: from unknown (HELO immanuel.kde.org) (138.246.255.177) by ktown.kde.org with SMTP; 16 Sep 2009 00:18:34 -0000
by immanuel.kde.org (Postfix, from userid 30) id 7A60B2083F; Wed, 16 Sep 2009 02:17:55 +0200 (CEST)

body.para: Summary: Konqueror crashed when I loaded another web page Product: konqueror Version: unspecified Platform: Unlisted Binaries OS/Version: Linux Status: UNCONFIRMED Severity: crash Priority: NOR Component: general AssignedTo: konq-bugs@kde.org ReportedBy: zuargo@gmail.com
Application that crashed: konqueror Version of the application: 4.3.1 (KDE 4.3.1) KDE Version: 4.3.1 (KDE 4.3.1) Qt Version: 4.5.2 Operating System: Linux 2.6.30-ARCH i686

What I was doing when the application crashed: Really I don't know what exactly caused this issue... I guess this happened, becouse the web page that I loaded, has many flash animations (spam), the web page is: http://www.comunidadconce.cl
but as I say really I don't know what caused this, sorry
